inputs.name: compute_disk_size_gb
inputs.description: Size of boot disk to create for the partition compute nodes

inputs.name: compute_disk_type
inputs.description: Type of boot disk to create for the partition compute nodes

inputs.name: cpu_platform
inputs.description: Minimum Intel Platform for Compute Nodes to Use

inputs.name: enable_placement
inputs.description: Enable placement groups

inputs.name: exclusive
inputs.description: Exclusive job access to nodes

inputs.name: gpu_count
inputs.description: Number of GPUs attached to the partition compute instances

inputs.name: gpu_type
inputs.description: Type of GPUs attached to the partition compute instances

inputs.name: image
inputs.description: Image to be used of the compute VMs in this partition

inputs.name: image_hyperthreads
inputs.description: Enable hyperthreading

inputs.name: instance_template
inputs.description: Instance template to use to create partition instances

inputs.name: labels
inputs.description: Labels to add to partition compute instances. List of key key, value pairs.

inputs.name: machine_type
inputs.description: Compute Platform machine type to use for this partition compute nodes

inputs.name: max_node_count
inputs.description: Maximum number of nodes allowed in this partition

inputs.name: network_storage
inputs.type:
list(object({
    server_ip     = string,
    remote_mount  = string,
    local_mount   = string,
    fs_type       = string,
    mount_options = string
  }))
inputs.description: An array of network attached storage mounts to be configured on the partition compute nodes.

inputs.name: partition_name
inputs.description: The name of the slurm partition

inputs.name: preemptible_bursting
inputs.description: Should use preemptibles to burst

inputs.name: regional_capacity
inputs.description: If True, then create instances in the region that has available capacity. Specify the region in the zone field.

inputs.name: regional_policy
inputs.description: locationPolicy defintion for regional bulkInsert()

inputs.name: static_node_count
inputs.description: Number of nodes to be statically created

inputs.name: subnetwork_name
inputs.description: The name of the pre-defined VPC subnet you want the nodes to attach to based on Region.

inputs.name: zone
inputs.description: Compute Platform zone where the notebook server will be located

outputs.name: partition
outputs.description: The partition structure containing all the set variables
